PPLoc: The policy has been furnished to our employees and it is located with our personnel files in the Human Resources department at our headquarters in Rock Hill, South Carolina; see link below
activities: 3D Systems Corporation (NYSE: DDD) is a holding company that operates through subsidiaries in the United States, Europe and the Asia-Pacific region.  The company designs, develops, manufactures, markets and services 3-D content to print solutions including, rapid manufacturing, computer-aided tools software, and prototyping systems and related products and materials that enable completx three-dimensional objects to be producted directly from computer data without tooling, greatly reducing the time and cost required to produce prototypes or customized production parts. The company centralizes the human resources function in the United States and as such, the HR department in the U.S. collects copies of personnel files for all employees outside of the United States, including the EU.
contacttitle1: Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
